net.antidot.paf

Interface Handle


  • public interface Handle
    This class represents a connection to the PaF scheduler.
    Version:
    7.4
    Author:
    Laurent Mazuel

    • Method Detail

      • receive

        Document receive()
        Return a document to process.
        Returns:
        A document to process.

      • new_document

        Document new_document(String uri)
        Create a new document from an uri. At this step, the document is not communicate to the scheduler. Then, some information like doc_id are setted to 0.
        Parameters:
        uri - The document uri.
        Returns:
        A new document.

      • delete_document

        void delete_document(String uri)
        Delete a document of the PaF.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri of the document to delete.

      • delete_documents

        void delete_documents(Set<String> uris)
        Delete a set of documents of the PaF.
        Parameters:
        uris - The set of uris to delete.

      • delete_where

        int delete_where(String where)
        Delete documents satisfying a set of criteria.
        Parameters:
        where - The where clause
        See Also:
        get_where()

      • send

        void send(Document document)
        Send a document to the next filter or ack him EOL if no next filter. You cannot use this document anymore after called this method.
        Parameters:
        document - The document.

      • send

        void send(Document document,
        String destination_filter_uri)
        Send a document to the filter in parameter, or ack him EOL if destination uri is empty. You cannot use this document anymore after called this method.
        Parameters:
        document - The document.
        destination_filter_uri - The destination uri.

      • send

        void send(Collection<Document> documents)
        Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if no next filter. The collection is cleared after this method.
        Parameters:
        documents - The collection of documents.

      • send

        void send(Collection<Document> documents,
        String destination_filter_uri)
        Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if destination uri is empty. The collection is cleared after this method.
        Parameters:
        documents - The collection of documents.
        destination_filter_uri - The destination uri.

      • send_if_new

        void send_if_new(Document document)
        Send a document to the next filter or ack him EOL if no next filter only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler. You cannot use this document anymore after called this method.
        Parameters:
        document - The document.

      • send_if_new

        void send_if_new(Document document,
               String destination_filter_uri)
        Send a document to the filter in parameter, or ack him EOL if destination uri is empty only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler. You cannot use this document anymore after called this method.
        Parameters:
        document - The document.
        destination_filter_uri - The destination uri.

      • send_if_new

        void send_if_new(Collection<Document> documents)
        Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if no next filter only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler. The collection is cleared after this method.
        Parameters:
        documents - The collection of documents.

      • send_if_new

        void send_if_new(Collection<Document> documents,
               String destination_filter_uri)
        Send a collection of documents to the next filter, or ack them EOL if destination uri is empty only if document is not referenced in the PaF scheduler. The collection is cleared after this method.
        Parameters:
        documents - The collection of documents.
        destination_filter_uri - The destination uri.

      • sync

        void sync(Document document)
        Save the document and do not send it to anyone.
        Parameters:
        document - the document.

      • sync

        void sync(Collection<Document> documents)
        Save the documents and do not send them to anyone.
        Parameters:
        documents - The documents.

      • get_document

        Document get_document(String uri)
        Get a document by its uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri.
        Returns:
        The document, or null if undefined.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The document, or null if undefined.

      • get_by_x

        DocumentQueue get_by_x(String x_id,
                     Set<net.antidot.protobuf.paf.PaFProtos.Status> status_filter)
        Get a set of documents using the x tag and a set of status.
        Parameters:
        x_id - The x tag.
        status_filter - The desired status.
        Returns:
        A set of documents.

      • get_by_y

        Get a set of documents using the y tag and a set of status.
        Parameters:
        y_id - The y tag.
        status_filter - The desired status.
        Returns:
        A set of documents.

      • get_by_z

                     Set<net.antidot.protobuf.paf.PaFProtos.Status> status_filter)
        Get a set of documents using the z tag and a set of status.
        Parameters:
        z_id - The z tag.
        status_filter - The desired status.
        Returns:
        A set of documents.

      • get_by_PaF_id

        DocumentQueue get_by_PaF_id(int paf_id,
                          Set<net.antidot.protobuf.paf.PaFProtos.Status> status_filter)
        Get a set of documents using a PaF id and a set of status.
        Parameters:
        paf_id - The desired PaF id
        status_filter - The desired status.
        Returns:
        A set of documents.

      • get_by_creation_date

        DocumentQueue get_by_creation_date(Date date,
                                 Set<net.antidot.protobuf.paf.PaFProtos.Status> status_filter)
        Get a set of documents using the creation date of documents.
        Parameters:
        date - A date.
        status_filter - The desired status.
        Returns:
        A set of documents.

      • get_where

        DocumentQueue get_where(String where)
        Get a DocumentQueue object (supports "len" and "iter") from a set of criteria. Available criteria are: - x, y, z - status, prevStatus - PaFId, prevPaFId - created - protocol - docId - lang - region Usable keywords are "and", "or", "not" and comparison operators (=, !=, <, >, <=, >=). For instance, where clause can be: z = 1 or (PaFId = 1 and status=KO)
        Parameters:
        where - The where clause
        Returns:
        A set of documents

      • count_where

        int count_where(String where)
        Count documents satisfying a set of criteria.
        Parameters:
        where - The where clause
        Returns:
        The number of matching documents
        See Also:
        get_where()

      • log

        void log(net.antidot.protobuf.event.EventProtos.Type type,
       String event,
       net.antidot.protobuf.event.EventProtos.Level level,
       String extra_contents)
        Log an event to the Back Office.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of event.
        event - The eventcontent.
        level - The level of event.
        extra_contents - Extra information.

      • log

        void log(net.antidot.protobuf.event.EventProtos.Type type,
       String event,
       net.antidot.protobuf.event.EventProtos.Level level)
        Log an event to the Back Office with no extra contents.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of event.
        event - The eventcontent.
        level - The level of event.

      • flush_log

        void flush_log()
        Force to flush events. The initial strategy is to flushed events each minute or when a message at least EventProtos.Type.WARNING is sent.
